img_summary: The image depicts the **Soul Remigration Pill**, a mythical item from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. This pill grants resurrection upon death and extends the duration of the Life Saving Strand ability. It can be obtained from Xu Dog in the Crouching Tiger Temple - Cellar in Yellow Wind Ridge during New Game Plus, or found in The Webbed Hollow past the Venom Daoist. The item is not craftable.
